alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Floyd; Grayson; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Alleghany and Surry Counties in northwestern North Carolina, western Stokes County in north central North Carolina, southwestern Floyd, Carroll, eastern Grayson and southwestern Patrick Counties in southwestern Virginia and the City of Galax through 730 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hillsville to near Fairview. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Airy... Galax... Flat Rock... Hillsville... Dobson... Pilot Mountain... and Fries. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
